LEI Reference Data Manifest

Source: GLEIF (Global Legal Entity Identifier Foundation)
Website: https://www.gleif.org/
Download: https://www.gleif.org/en/lei-data/gleif-golden-copy/download-the-golden-copy

Data Files
----------
1. LEI Golden Copy (lei2)
   - Pattern: YYYYMMDD-0800-gleif-goldencopy-lei2-golden-copy.csv
   - Content: All registered LEI entities (~3.2M records)
   - Size: ~4.3 GB
   - Fields: 200+ columns including LEI, legal name, address, category, status

2. Relationship Records (rr)
   - Pattern: YYYYMMDD-0800-gleif-goldencopy-rr-golden-copy.csv
   - Content: Corporate hierarchy relationships (~463K records)
   - Size: ~221 MB
   - Fields: Start node, end node, relationship type, dates

Subset Files
------------
3. LEI Subset (small)
   - Pattern: YYYYMMDD-0800-gleif-goldencopy-lei2-golden-copy-subset-small.csv
   - Content: Diverse subset (~10K entities)
   - Size: ~7 MB

4. LEI Subset (large)
   - Pattern: YYYYMMDD-0800-gleif-goldencopy-lei2-golden-copy-subset-large.csv
   - Content: Diverse subset (~50K entities)
   - Size: ~35 MB

5. RR Subset (small)
   - Pattern: YYYYMMDD-0800-gleif-goldencopy-rr-golden-copy-subset-small.csv
   - Content: Relationships for small subset
   - Size: ~1 MB

6. RR Subset (large)
   - Pattern: YYYYMMDD-0800-gleif-goldencopy-rr-golden-copy-subset-large.csv
   - Content: Relationships for large subset
   - Size: ~5 MB

Version
-------
Current data: 2026-01-23 (updated daily by GLEIF)
Golden copy is refreshed daily at 08:00 UTC.
